reviews.review: An asymmetrical multiplayer horror game that's a ton of fun! It'll take some time to get used to the gameplay and mindset for select roles, but it definitely is worth it! Being able to hide in lockers and meme on killers is the best part of the game to me! It's a ton of fun alone, but with friends its even better!! The game though still has a few annoying bugs and the balance tends to jump around with certain perks. The DLC is also a huge money sink. 8/10 for me. If you buy it, happy killin' (or survivin')! ;)

This gameplay is pretty unique.  It's an asymmetrical multiplayer game that actually makes sense and really exploits all of the IP available.  None of the DLC characters are cash-ins but are true to the spirit of the material.  It has its share of technical issues on occasion, and the playerbase has its moments of extreme toxicity, but it also has its moments of genuine pro-sociality.

Balanced game with nothing to complain about apart from being in the low ranks which involves a lot of running and little reward for gens being finished from fear factor and lack of skill. That's normal in most games so w.e i guess

This game is really fun when the Hit Boxes work. Overall good game design and unique idea for a horror game, reminds me of Friday The 13th.

Edit:

Game was fun for a long time with friends. Now every game is just toxic or filled with bugs. If you want to have fun with friends... it won't be in this game. Camping, tunneling, hackers, toxic text chat and more is all you'll find.
HUH
really fun to play

Game wasn't my cup of tea. Purchased yesterday, 11/10/2019, played a few matches and closed it and was planning on requesting a refund today. 
Due to a bug it registered the game has being played after the main process was was closed and accrued 15 hours of game time in the day since it was purchased. Because of that steam refuses to refund.

Do you enjoy multiplayer horror games? If so look no further because Dead by daylight is the game for you! For such a low price you are getting a masterpiece. Amazing graphics, Amazing sound tracks, and TONS of fun!
I Strongly recommend this game

One of the best games IÂ¨ve tried in years. - My only regret I saw it this late, started 3 weeks ago and now 160 hours into it. 

Absolutly stunning - so simple and yet so hard to master.
You rely on TEAMWORK like never before. 
If you not are the teamplaying type - dont buy it ! Really just dont ! 

And best of everything - no ingame chat, so toxic people is eliminated until the game is over, where you quickly is able to move on.

What I do miss/need in this game is that there is taking care of toxic people in some sort of punishment to them, it ruins a lot of rounds in this game.

But overall a really timeconsuming game, and as I can see they are still updating this game frequently ! 

8/10 !

I see this game as a good time filler. It can be really fun at times and it can be really frustrating at times. I like the variety of killers and skills. My biggest complaint is that there's a lot of bugs and the devs don't seem to care about player feedback much. Additionally, there's only one game mode, so honestly it can just be a lot of the same gameplay sometimes.

The game is very fun, Chinese is also doing very well, but there is a flaw, that is, since it is chinese, why not set the chat to use the input method to type, every chat can only pass pinyin, it is difficult in a short time Go to know; also ask game developers to improve.

Dont fucking buy this piece of garbage. For starters, killers have perks like:
''Stand still for 0.1 secs and you will be able to just look at a survivor and get them on death hook.''
Meanwhile survivor perks are:
''You have to be this character, in these clothes at this level in this map, in this zone of the map, doing this specific thing for this to activate and give you 0.1 percent faster gen repair speed.'' This game is so unfair. And before you start saying that I need to get good and stop whining, that is the problem. A game is supposed to be fun and fair even for players who dont really want to go deep into learning the games machanics. But this garbage. To have even a little bit of a fair game, you need to pour you time,money and life into it. Just dont buy it. You will save money,time and stress.

Kind of lost interest in all other games because Depresso! but Dead by Daylight is the one exception. If you have friends to play/voice chat with, you'll have the time of your life. Even without, it's a blast.

Just unplayable at this point. Survivors can't really do much.
Need more balancing...

So when I was first introduced to this game I absolutely hated it because it is has a rather high learning curve.  Every survivor has different abilities and every killer does as well so from match to match you just feel clueless.  The game has so many little debuffs like "exposed" or "mangled" but in order to figure out what these debuffs actually do, you have to use the good ole google because no where in the game itself does it bother to explain it to you.  More of lack of development foresight and a mild annoyance than anything else.

The real issue in DBD is connectivity.  I've just que'd as the killer 3 games in a row and the wait times are 10-15 per game.  Worse yet is i was disconnected from ALL THREE matches back to back.  These disconnections will lower your in game player score and ensure you are doomed when you finally get a match that plays out until its over.

In a recent patch the devs, in all their wisdom, decided to cross-platform so that PC players can now play with people on the Nintendo switch, X-Box, and PS4.  They should really consider stabilizing the single platform they have before opening that cup of worms.

Once you get the hang of the game and stop getting disconnected it's worth giving a try, but it its current state I would not pay a dime for it.
